p: With documentation that YF was transmitted by mosquitoes ( Reed et al., 1900), many early workers suspected that DF was also a mosquito-borne disease. It was the first documentation that mosquitoes could transmit DF ( Graham, 1903). This work was followed, which showed conclusively that A. aegypti could transmit the disease to volunteers following a 10-day incubation period after the mosquitoes had fed on a person acutely ill with DF.
